name: Strange Creatures
description:
Strange Creatures is a 1 to 4 player couch co-op puzzle game where players are curious creatures that use wacky abilities to solve puzzles and escape the wicked lab.


Players will play as 1 of 4 different creatures:
Arlo the Cataconda
Ernest the Birdle
Rosie the Bull-frog
Scout the Lecko

Either by themselves or with their friends players will use each of these characters' unique abilities to escape the lab that they have been trapped in.
